payment_plans.title: Planes y precios
payment_plans.title_question: Choose a plan for your company.
payment_plans.cost_proposal: Optimum workspace and cost cutting proposal.

contact_form.title: Interested? Contact us!
contact_form.description: You can {link} at your convenience, contact us at info@dewocracy.com or send us a message via the contact form below.
contact_form.thanks: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly

desk_booking.title: Hot desking, easier than ever
desk_booking.text_1: Intuitive desk booking with interactive office maps.
desk_booking.text_2: Create neighborhoods assigning groups of desks to teams or individuals. Activate and deactivate desks according to your needs.
desk_booking.text_3: Speak with an expert to start now and know our prices.

neighbourhoods.title: Organize the office and your people
neighbourhoods.text_1: Organize your office and use your space in an efficient and flexible way.
neighbourhoods.text_2: Create neighborhoods assigning groups of desks to teams or individuals to facilitate team work and face-to-face interaction. Activate and deactivate desks to implement contingency measures derived from the pandemic.
neighbourhoods.text_3: Speak with an expert to start now and know our prices.

manage_remotework.title: Manage remote work efficiently
manage_remotework.text_1: Give your workforce access to a workspace calendar linked to the admin's dashboard.
manage_remotework.text_2: Set occupancy and capacity limits so that no one is left without a desk in the office. Implement capacity restrictions as a pandemic contingency measure.
manage_remotework.text_3: Implement remote work limits to guarantee face-to-face interaction and implement your company workspace policies.

analytics.title: Analytics and reports
analytics.text_1: Analyze occupancy, space usage and costs associated to it. Gain insights on your workforce at a group and individual level to ensure compliance with remote work laws.
analytics.text_2: With DeWocracy you can historically audit your workforce office attendance and remote work prevalence.
analytics.text_3: Additionally, with the Pro Office plan you will have access to custom reports with the data you care about in .xls or .csv format.

Default.We help you transition to a more flexibl: We help you transition to a more flexible workplace strategy that is less dependant on physical space. From idea to execution, we support you throughout all the stages of the process.
Default.We give you the tools to measure office: We give you the tools to measure office occupancy, understand employees' preferences, and analize costs derived from your current workplace strategy.
Default.We use the data gathered to make an offi: We use the data gathered to make an office space optimization proposal and find out your ideal workplace strategy (traditional office, flexible office, hybrid work or remote work).
Default.Implement your strategy using our bookin: Implement your strategy using our booking, monitoring and cost analysis system. Manage the admin side of remote work efficiently and assess your results to fine-tune your strategy.
Default.Real-time monitoring of your company's r: Real-time monitoring of your company's remote/in-office work breakdown.

Default.DeWocracy offers remote work solutions f: DeWocracy offers remote work solutions for a hybrid office strategy. Manage your company's human capital, control the office occupancy rate, lower costs and increase flexibility without compromising productivity.
